\mbox{\Hypertarget{buffer_8h_ae6d37bd10eaaf2a2eb094f18396444e4}\label{buffer_8h_ae6d37bd10eaaf2a2eb094f18396444e4}} 
\index{buffer.h@{buffer.h}!BUFFER\_APPEND@{BUFFER\_APPEND}}
\index{BUFFER\_APPEND@{BUFFER\_APPEND}!buffer.h@{buffer.h}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{BUFFER\_APPEND}{BUFFER\_APPEND}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define BUFFER\+\_\+\+APPEND(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{buffer,  }\item[{}]{item }\end{DoxyParamCaption})~ do\{\mbox{\hyperlink{buffer_8h_a37f9cf513bd9786bb01c8671e869b888}{BUFFER\+\_\+\+VAL}}(buffer) = item; \mbox{\hyperlink{buffer_8h_a1e5fb1cf72e3f500dd55507497ddeb60}{BUFFER\+\_\+\+NEXT}}(buffer);\}while(0)}

Append an item to the buffer by value. Automatically increases the buffer count. It does not check for buffer overflow. In case of buffer overflow the behaviour is undefined. Use BUFFER\+\_\+\+FULL to check if buffer is full before using this macro. 

Definition at line 146 of file buffer.\+h.

\mbox{\Hypertarget{buffer_8h_a826dbfcbc8e6e44da1a998d941e9070d}\label{buffer_8h_a826dbfcbc8e6e44da1a998d941e9070d}}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define BUFFER\+\_\+\+COUNT(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{buffer }\end{DoxyParamCaption})~    ((buffer).count)}

Returns the current number of items used in the buffer.

Checks if no further buffer items are available. Returns 1 if buffer is full, otherwise 0.

\mbox{\Hypertarget{buffer_8h_a1e5fb1cf72e3f500dd55507497ddeb60}\label{buffer_8h_a1e5fb1cf72e3f500dd55507497ddeb60}} 
\index{buffer.h@{buffer.h}!BUFFER\_NEXT@{BUFFER\_NEXT}}
\index{BUFFER\_NEXT@{BUFFER\_NEXT}!buffer.h@{buffer.h}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{BUFFER\_NEXT}{BUFFER\_NEXT}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define BUFFER\+\_\+\+NEXT(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{buffer }\end{DoxyParamCaption})~    (++\mbox{\hyperlink{buffer_8h_a826dbfcbc8e6e44da1a998d941e9070d}{BUFFER\+\_\+\+COUNT}}(buffer))}

Moves to next free item in the buffer. It does not check for buffer overflow. In case of buffer overflow the behaviour is undefined. Use BUFFER\+\_\+\+FULL to check if buffer is full before using this macro. 

Definition at line 124 of file buffer.\+h.

\mbox{\Hypertarget{buffer_8h_ae0985a6e4da09d654a62ef58b0fddf96}\label{buffer_8h_ae0985a6e4da09d654a62ef58b0fddf96}}

\index{BUFFER\_TYPEDEF@{BUFFER\_TYPEDEF}!buffer.h@{buffer.h}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{BUFFER\_TYPEDEF}{BUFFER\_TYPEDEF}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define BUFFER\+\_\+\+TYPEDEF(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{name,  }\item[{}]{type,  }\item[{}]{size }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

{\bfseries Value\+:}
\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{    \textcolor{keyword}{typedef} \textcolor{keyword}{struct }\{                    \(\backslash\)}
\DoxyCodeLine{            size\_t count;               \(\backslash\)}
\DoxyCodeLine{            type items [size];          \(\backslash\)}
\DoxyCodeLine{    \} name\#\#\_buffer\_t}

\end{DoxyCode}
Declares a buffer type. The argumnents are {\itshape name} for a unique identification of the buffer type, the {\itshape type} of the items and the number of items of {\itshape type} the buffer can hold ({\itshape size}). 

Definition at line 50 of file buffer.\+h.
